index

class BaseTool

Revision History

General information:

Author: klaas" //! version="1.0

Version:

Date: Wed Oct 20 9:03:10 MET 1999

Header files:

  • wxwin.h
  • windrv.h
  • tool.h

Code files:

  • tool.cpp

Description:

    all interactive drawing using tools are derived from this base class. All mouse and key events on the canvas/client window are redirected to this class, via the ToolControl class. The tool derived from this base class, defines what needs to be done with the events.

Related types:

  • ToolControl (class)
  • DrawDriver (class)
  • WindowsDriver (class)
  • BoxTool (class)
  • SelectTool (class)
